page.title: 10ELDERLY CARE, SOMERFORD AREA
page.content: Hill House is a private old peoples home in our area which is run by Mrs.Hendrick and she has 20 staff to help her.Originally the building was a small farm house but it has been extended.It is limited to 16 residents and at present this includes a married couple.The staff,who are all local people,provide a 24 hour service.The residents each have a private bedroom and they can have their own furniture in it.Because the residents are often frail,baths and not showers are provided.For the same reason,they have a lift.The staff,who are not trained nurses,help to wash and dress the residents and do all their shopping for them. Most of the old people have not lived locally but their families are usually not too far away.They all seem to enjoy living there.
